mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.student_id AS "studentId", a.question_ids AS "questionIds", a.user_name AS "userName", a.company AS "company", a.scene AS "scene", a.score_sum AS "scoreSum", a.correct_sum AS "correctSum", a.error_sum AS "errorSum", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_record( student_id, question_ids, user_name, company, scene, score_sum, correct_sum, error_sum, use_type, create_time ) VALUES ( #{studentId}, #{questionIds}, #{userName}, #{company}, #{scene}, #{scoreSum}, #{correctSum}, #{errorSum}, #{useType}, #{createTime} )
